title: Radiant Glow Serum
description: A luxurious vitamin C serum that brightens and evens skin tone while reducing the appearance of fine lines.
longDescription: Our signature Radiant Glow Serum combines potent vitamin C with hyaluronic acid and botanical extracts to deliver transformative results. This lightweight formula absorbs quickly, leaving skin luminous and refreshed without any sticky residue.
usage: Apply 2-3 drops to clean, dry skin morning and evening. Follow with moisturizer.

title: Deep Hydration Cream
description: Rich, nourishing moisturizer that provides 24-hour hydration. Perfect for dry and sensitive skin types.
longDescription: Experience ultimate hydration with our Deep Hydration Cream. This rich yet non-greasy formula penetrates deeply to restore moisture balance and strengthen the skin barrier. Wake up to plump, supple skin.
usage: Apply to face and neck after cleansing and serum application, morning and night.

title: Gentle Cleansing Balm
description: Luxurious oil-based cleanser that melts away makeup and impurities while nourishing skin.
longDescription: Our award-winning Gentle Cleansing Balm offers a spa-like cleansing experience. The unique formula dissolves even waterproof makeup while maintaining skin's natural moisture barrier.
usage: Massage onto dry skin, add water to emulsify, then rinse thoroughly. Use evening.

title: Revitalizing Eye Cream
description: Targeted treatment for the delicate eye area. Reduces dark circles, puffiness, and fine lines.
longDescription: This concentrated eye cream delivers powerful anti-aging benefits to the delicate eye area. Caffeine reduces puffiness while peptides smooth fine lines and wrinkles.
usage: Gently pat a small amount around the eye area morning and evening.

title: Exfoliating Toner
description: Gentle yet effective AHA/BHA toner that refines pores, smooths texture, and brightens complexion.
longDescription: Our Exfoliating Toner combines glycolic and salicylic acids to gently resurface skin, revealing a smoother, more radiant complexion. Witch hazel and aloe soothe while balancing.
usage: Apply to clean skin with a cotton pad or hands, avoiding eye area. Use 2-3 times weekly.

title: Nourishing Face Oil
description: Luxurious blend of botanical oils that deeply nourishes and restores radiance.
longDescription: This exquisite face oil combines precious botanical oils to deliver intense nourishment and a healthy glow. Perfect for dry skin or as a final step in your evening routine.
usage: Apply 2-4 drops to damp skin, morning or evening. Can be mixed with moisturizer.

title: Brightening Face Mask
description: Weekly treatment mask that illuminates and evens skin tone. Kaolin clay draws out impurities.
longDescription: Transform dull, tired skin with our Brightening Face Mask. This creamy clay formula works in just 10 minutes to reveal a luminous, refreshed complexion.
usage: Apply an even layer to clean skin, avoiding eye area. Leave for 10-15 minutes, then rinse.

title: Retinol Night Treatment
description: Advanced anti-aging treatment with encapsulated retinol. Reduces wrinkles, improves texture.
longDescription: Our gentle yet effective Retinol Night Treatment harnesses the power of encapsulated retinol to minimize irritation while delivering maximum results. Wake up to smoother, younger-looking skin.
usage: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean, dry skin at night. Start 2-3 times weekly, increase as tolerated.

title: Hydrating Mist
description: Refreshing facial mist that instantly hydrates and sets makeup.
longDescription: Keep skin refreshed throughout the day with our Hydrating Mist. This ultra-fine mist delivers instant hydration and can be used before or after makeup application.
usage: Hold 8-10 inches from face and mist. Use throughout the day as needed.

title: SPF 50 Sunscreen
description: Lightweight, invisible sunscreen with broad-spectrum SPF 50 protection.
longDescription: Protect your skin with our advanced SPF 50 Sunscreen. This invisible, weightless formula provides superior broad-spectrum protection without white cast or greasiness.
usage: Apply generously to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours.

title: Lip Treatment Balm
description: Intensive lip treatment that heals, hydrates, and plumps.
longDescription: Our Lip Treatment Balm is a luxurious blend of nourishing oils and butters that transform dry, chapped lips into soft, supple perfection.
usage: Apply to lips as needed throughout the day and before bed.

title: Detox Clay Mask
description: Deep-cleansing mask that purifies pores and removes impurities.
longDescription: Experience a spa-quality detox with our Detox Clay Mask. This powerful yet gentle formula draws out toxins and excess oil, leaving skin refreshed and balanced.
usage: Apply to clean skin 1-2 times weekly. Leave for 10 minutes, then rinse with warm water.
